hero.title: Welcome to FabLab AI Research
hero.description: Advancing AI in Local Languages and 3D Printing in Agriculture

aboutUs.title: We train, equip, and connect young leaders to excel!
aboutUs.description: With a young and growing population, Niger faces unique challenges in development. At Next Leadership, we empower young people with the tools to lead, innovate, and make a difference. Since 2016, we have equipped thousands across Africa with skills like public speaking, leadership, and 21st-century competencies.

program.title: Explore Our Programs
program.description: Discover our diverse programs designed to empower young leaders in various fields. Choose the program that best aligns with your aspirations and career goals.
program.blogDesNext: A robust training experience for young professionals and graduates ( 20-30 years old) to thrive in competitive careers. Master human and conceptual skills, sharpen administrative abilities, and explore the basics of entrepreneurship.
program.blogDesYouth: Tailored for Highschool Students ( 15-20 years old), this program focuses on civic engagement, Academic excellence, Communication skills, Leadership and essential entrepreneurial skills.

workWithUs.title: Work with us
workWithUs.description: We empower young leaders with the skills to lead, innovate, and make a difference. Join us to shape the future.

footer.slogan: Empowering the next generation of leaders for a brighter future.

Hero2.title: Empowering Future Leaders
Hero2.description: Join our Next Leadership and Youth Leadership Programs to shape the leaders of tomorrow.
